jd: From: sandeep, SVAM International skemisetti@svam.com Reply to: skemisetti@svam.com Hi,Hope you are doing great,Hiring on Sr DevSecOps ,NET Developer - RemoteExperience : 15+Mandatory Skills:NET development (C#, ASP.NET, MVC, Web API).SecDevOps principles and methodologies.(CISSP, CEH, Security+)JOB Summary:Skilled .NET Developer with a strong background in SecDevOps, cybersecurity, and vulnerability prevention. The ideal candidate will play a critical role in designing, developing, and securing applications while collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to implement secure coding practices and ensure compliance with security standards.Qualifications:- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. - 3+ years of experience in .NET development (C#, ASP.NET, MVC, Web API).- Strong understanding of SecDevOps principles and methodologies.- Proven experience in cybersecurity and vulnerability prevention techniques.- Familiarity with security frameworks (OWASP, NIST).- Experience with cloud platforms (Azure/AWS) and their security features.- Proficiency in database technologies (Oracle, PL/SQL, SQL Server, Entity Framework).- Knowledge of version control systems and CI/CD tools (Azure DevOps).- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.Preferred Skills:- Certifications in cybersecurity (CISSP, CEH, Security+) are a plus.- Experience with containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes).- Familiarity with scripting languages (Python).
